Description:
Detects the use of Jlaive to execute assemblies in a copied PowerShell

Author: Jose Luis Sanchez Martinez (@Joseliyo_Jstnk)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - Jlaive In-Memory Assembly Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((parent_process_path like '%\cmd.exe' and parent_command_line like '%.bat') and ((process_path like '%\attrib.exe' and (command like '%+s%' and command like '%+h%' and command like '%.bat.exe%')) or (process_path like '%\xcopy.exe' and (command like '%powershell.exe%' and command like '%.bat.exe%')) or (process_path like '%\xcopy.exe' and (command like '%pwsh.exe%' and command like '%.bat.exe%'))))
